page.title: 09CLUBS IN KIRKCOWAN
page.content: Since 1973 the{Cubs}have met in the Cub Hut in Church Street.There are {10 {members}between 8 and 11 years old. They work for{badges}like Gardening, Home-help,First Aid,Cycling, Photography etc.The Cub Pack sometimes go into a nearby wood for{Sausage {Sizzle.}The present leader has been a leader since October 1976.Sometimes the pack competes in competitions at Loch{Inch}Stranraer. Since 1928 the {Brownies}have met in Kirkcowan Primary{School Hall.}About { {8 girls}go aged{7}to{10}years.In the summer they go{nature trails}in the wood and they try to identify trees.At times they sit{badges}such as house orderly's,cookery's,writer's,and gymnast's badges. They go{pack {holidays}to Stronord near Newton Stewart.When it is fine they play outdoor{games.
